Print examples of chapter 1 of 'R for Dummies'.

ch01.Rd

To print a listing of all examples of a chapter, use ch1(). To run all the examples of ch1(), use example(ch1).

ch01()

ch1()

## Performing multiple calculations with vectors

x <- 1:5
x
#> [1] 1 2 3 4 5
x + 2
#> [1] 3 4 5 6 7
x + 6:10
#> [1]  7  9 11 13 15
